Name: Blinding Speed
Description: On your turn, you may move 5 times instead of 4.

Name: Outpost
Description: When placing Banners, you may place two Banners on the same space.

Name: Tunnel Keys
Description: When you move, all tiles with your Banners on them are adjacent to each other, and you may move freely between them. This only applies when you are moving during your turn.
